Invite.confirm-decline_message: Do you really want to decline your invitation for Morphic?
Invite.dialog-register_title: Sign up for Morphic to accept
Invite.info-p1: The person or organization who invited you wants to create and manage MorphicBars for you.
Invite.info-p2: If you accept, they will be able to make and update MorphicBars for your computer. They cannot see or change other bars or things on your computer.
Invite.message-accepted: You have accepted your Morphic invitation.
Invite.message-declined: You have declined your Morphic invitation.
Invite.message-invalid: Your invitation has expired or this link is invalid. Please ask for a new invitation (from the person who invited you).
Invite.register-email_description: You can change this if you want to use a different email address
Invite.register-form-lead: To accept your Morphic invitation and MorphicBar, you need to create a Morphic account below (unless you already have a Morphic account).
Invite.sign-in-form-lead: To accept your Morphic invitation and MorphicBar, you need to sign into your Morphic account below (or create a Morphic account if you do not have one).
Invite.sign-in-register_link: Sign up for a new Morphic account with a different email

Plans.leave_heading: Not sure you want to stay with Morphic?
Plans.leave_text:
If you no longer want to manage your group, you can close it. Once the group is closed, all of
          your group members will lose there personalizations. Each person will see the basic Morphic Bar.

ResetPassword.instructions: Please enter your email address, and we will email you instructions to you on how to reset your password.
ResetPassword.heading: Reset your password
ResetPassword.success: Instructions to recover your password have been emailed to you.

getting-started.link:
30 Second Tutorial:
Getting Started with the Customization Tool

text: Click the @:(MembersList.add-member_button) button. Then click @:(MembersList.add-bar_button) for that person.
The MorphicBar you selected appears in the middle section of the screen.
It looks the way it might look on a computer.
The right column lists different buttons you can add.
Add buttons by clicking or dragging.
Do you want to make changes to a button?
Click a button on the bar and make your changes.
Step 5: Pushing the bar to the user
When you like how the bar looks, push it to the user and it will appear on the user’s computer.
When you are done, select another bar or just close the tool.
You can come back and make changes at any time.

getting-started.title: Tutorial: Getting started with Morphic Plus
